id.name: Rekayasa Interaksi
id.description: 1. Prospek Rekayasa Interaksi, Model Rekayasa Kebergunaan, Pemodelan Interaksi, Pengenalan User Experience (UX) Pemodelan Dialog, Manajemen Error. 2. Eksplorasi Prospek Rekayasa Interaksi.
id.syllabus: 1. Prospek Rekayasa Interaksi, Model Rekayasa Kebergunaan, Pemodelan Interaksi, Pengenalan User Experience (UX) Pemodelan Dialog, Manajemen Error. 2. Eksplorasi Prospek Rekayasa Interaksi.
id.outcomes: Mahasiswa mampu mendefinisikan prospek model interaksi dalam aktivitas pengembangan perangkat lunakMahasiswa memiliki pengalaman dalam merancang model interaksi untuk sebuah aplikasi dalam alur pengembangan produk.

en.name: Interaction Engineering
en.description: 1. Prospect of Interaction Engineering, Usability Engineering Model, Interaction Modelling, Introduction to User Experience (UX) Dialog Modelling, Error Management. 2. Exploration of the prospects of Interaction Engineering.
en.syllabus: 1. Prospect of Interaction Engineering, Usability Engineering Model, Interaction Modelling, Introduction to User Experience (UX) Dialog Modelling, Error Management. 2. Exploration of the prospects of Interaction Engineering.
en.outcomes: Students are able to define the prospect interaction model in software development activitiesStudents have experience in designing interaction model for an application in product development stream
